actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the Defense Production Act of 1950, as amended.

summary.text: Defense Production Act Extension Amendments - Amends the Defense Production Act of 1950: (1) to pay the expenses of the Joint Committee on Defense Production from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives; and (2) to extend the provisions of such Act through September 30, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Defense Production Act of 1950, as amended.
